statements.select:
SELECT TF_ID AS TfId,TF_CM_ID AS TfCmId,TF_DMA_ID AS TfDmaId,TF_Head_Parm1 AS TfHeadParm1,TF_Head_Parm2 AS TfHeadParm2,TF_Head_Parm3 AS TfHeadParm3,TF_Head_Parm4 AS TfHeadParm4,TF_Head_Parm5 AS TfHeadParm5,TF_Company_Name AS TfCompanyName,TF_Country AS TfCountry,TF_IsExclusive AS TfIsExclusive,TF_ExpirationDate AS TfExpirationDate,TF_Termination_EffectiveDate AS TfTerminationEffectiveDate,TF_Reason_AccRec AS TfReasonAccRec,TF_Reason_NotQuota AS TfReasonNotQuota,TF_Reason_PlDis AS TfReasonPlDis,TF_Reason_Other AS TfReasonOther,TF_Reason_OtherReasons AS TfReasonOtherReasons,TF_Reasons AS TfReasons,TF_OutstandingAmount AS TfOutstandingAmount,TF_QuotaAmount AS TfQuotaAmount,TF_ActualSales AS TfActualSales,TF_GoodsAmount AS TfGoodsAmount,TF_HasRGAAttached AS TfHasrgaAttached,TF_IsOutstandingTenders AS TfIsOutstandingTenders,TF_PostTermination AS TfPostTermination,TF_DuePayment AS TfDuePayment,TF_CreditAmount AS TfCreditAmount,TF_IsBankGuarantee AS TfIsBankGuarantee,TF_GuaranteeAmount AS TfGuaranteeAmount,TF_IsReserve AS TfIsReserve,TF_ReserveAmount AS TfReserveAmount,TF_Settlement AS TfSettlement,TF_WriteOff AS TfWriteOff,TF_ReserveType AS TfReserveType,TF_RSM_PrintName AS TfRsmPrintName,TF_RSM_Date AS TfRsmDate,TF_FM_PrintName AS TfFmPrintName,TF_FM_Date AS TfFmDate,TF_VPFinance_PrintName AS TfVpFinancePrintName,TF_VPFinance_Date AS TfVpFinanceDate,TF_VP_PrintName AS TfVpPrintName,TF_VP_Date AS TfVpDate FROM TerminationForm
TF_DMA_ID = #value#

SELECT TF_ID AS TfId,TF_CM_ID AS TfCmId,TF_DMA_ID AS TfDmaId,TF_Head_Parm1 AS TfHeadParm1,TF_Head_Parm2 AS TfHeadParm2,TF_Head_Parm3 AS TfHeadParm3,TF_Head_Parm4 AS TfHeadParm4,TF_Head_Parm5 AS TfHeadParm5,TF_Company_Name AS TfCompanyName,TF_Country AS TfCountry,TF_IsExclusive AS TfIsExclusive,TF_ExpirationDate AS TfExpirationDate,TF_Termination_EffectiveDate AS TfTerminationEffectiveDate,TF_Reason_AccRec AS TfReasonAccRec,TF_Reason_NotQuota AS TfReasonNotQuota,TF_Reason_PlDis AS TfReasonPlDis,TF_Reason_Other AS TfReasonOther,TF_Reason_OtherReasons AS TfReasonOtherReasons,TF_Reasons AS TfReasons,TF_OutstandingAmount AS TfOutstandingAmount,TF_QuotaAmount AS TfQuotaAmount,TF_ActualSales AS TfActualSales,TF_GoodsAmount AS TfGoodsAmount,TF_HasRGAAttached AS TfHasrgaAttached,TF_IsOutstandingTenders AS TfIsOutstandingTenders,TF_PostTermination AS TfPostTermination,TF_DuePayment AS TfDuePayment,TF_CreditAmount AS TfCreditAmount,TF_IsBankGuarantee AS TfIsBankGuarantee,TF_GuaranteeAmount AS TfGuaranteeAmount,TF_IsReserve AS TfIsReserve,TF_ReserveAmount AS TfReserveAmount,TF_Settlement AS TfSettlement,TF_WriteOff AS TfWriteOff,TF_ReserveType AS TfReserveType,TF_RSM_PrintName AS TfRsmPrintName,TF_RSM_Date AS TfRsmDate,TF_FM_PrintName AS TfFmPrintName,TF_FM_Date AS TfFmDate,TF_VPFinance_PrintName AS TfVpFinancePrintName,TF_VPFinance_Date AS TfVpFinanceDate,TF_VP_PrintName AS TfVpPrintName,TF_VP_Date AS TfVpDate FROM TerminationForm
TF_ID = #Id#
